name: Inverter
description: Power inverter, such as solar inverters etc.

name: Lightbulb
description: Devices that illuminate something, such as bulbs, etc.

name: Lock
description: Devices whose primary pupose is locking something

name: NetworkAppliance
description: Bridges/Gateway need to access other devices like used by Philips Hue for example, Routers, Switches

name: PowerOutlet
description: Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there

name: Projector
description: Devices that project a picture somewhere

name: RadiatorControl
description: Controls on radiators used to heat up rooms

name: Receiver
description: Audio/Video receivers, i.e. radio receivers, satelite or cable receivers, recorders, etc.

name: Screen
description: Devices that are able to show a picture

name: Speaker
description: Devices that are able to play sounds

name: WallSwitch
description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

name: WebService
description: Account with credentials for a website

name: WhiteGood
description: Devices that look like Waschingmachines, Dishwashers, Dryers, Fridges, Ovens, etc.
